bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Organizational Reliability Capability
IEEE Draft Standard for Organizational Reliability Capability
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1624/D4, Jun 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This Standard defines organizational reliability capability and identifies the criteria for assessing the reliability capability of an organization.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
